title: BEST EXTRAS!!!Pet-Friendly•1BR 1BA apt •philadelphia area•W/D AVAILABL
description:
Call this updated apartment 'home' while exploring all that Philadelphia has to offer! With 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, and the comforts of home, this apartment offers prime accommodations for both couples. Don't forget your walking shoes - this unit is located within a short stroll of numerous eateries, shops, and scenic parks like Passyunk Square. Not much farther, you'll find the city's show-stopping sights including Independence Hall and Reading Terminal Market.
With an outdoor pool, cyber café, indoor basketball court, golf simulator, and a game room with air hockey, billiards, and card tables all in attendance, this condominium genuinely offers you everything you would reasonably want and more. Your gorgeous new condo features 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom spread over 662 square feet. Entering the home, an open foyer with luxury vinyl flooring and fresh paint greets you. To your left is your new gourmet kitchen that offers granite countertops, a recently replaced stainless-steel refrigerator, and essential laundry space. Continuing through the home, you will step into your dining area, which offers more luxury vinyl flooring, some stylish overhead lighting, and an open floor plan that leads into your living area. With a stunning set of french doors offering a beautiful view of the tranquil courtyard, this space is inundated with copious amounts of natural light, making sure it shines bright with life for years to come. This home is perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing after a long day as you enjoy the peaceful view. You will find the primary bedroom directly off of the living room, which is spacious, providing you with the zen retreat you deserve. The bathroom is quite sizable and offers a vanity with lots of storage, as well as a shower and tub. look no more for the perfect location and light filled third floor condo! One block to the McLean Silver Line Metro, Capital One headquarters, Starbucks and the new WEGMANS coming soon! One metro stop to Tyson's, a mile to the Galleria and many restaurants all around to choose from! Easy access to 495/Express lanes, 66, Dulles Toll Road and Jones Branch Connector. Turn-key 1 bedroom, 1 bath with amazing private view of green space out of newer windows and private patio! 9 ft ceilings, and one underground garage parking space dedicated specifically to the unit. Tons of updates and freshly painted! Updated granite kitchen and bathroom includes 2018 shabby chic cabinets with new hardware, LED recessed lights throughout & pendants, new faucets in kitchen and bathroom, 2018 custom wire shelving in laundry room and walk-in master closet, and 2018 new SMART switches & USB outlets. Condo amenities are abundant in this beautiful sunlit condo that makes you happy once you step inside! Outdoor pool & hot-tub, basketball court, tot lot, event space, fitness center, business center & plentiful parking for guests and discounted electric vehicle charging stations for residents!

title: beautiful West Philly 3 bedroom home
description:
This beautiful 3 bedroom 1.5 bathroom West Philly charmer is on a quiet little block that ends at Cobbs Creek Park, near 58th St. and Baltimore Ave. It has tons of original details and an end-of-row status that brings in bonus natural light through a combo of side and interior windows. There's an abundance of original woodwork beginning in the enclosed front porch/sun room and continuing throughout: oak floors with mahogany inlay, glass-paneled entry door, stately window and door trim as well as multiple built-in cabinets.
The kitchen was renovated less than five years ago and features charcoal gray quartz countertops, butcher block island with farmhouse sink with garbage disposal, stainless steel Samsung appliances (including a dishwasher) and chimney hood, white Shaker-style cabinets and a leaded glass picture window.  The mudroom on this level also got an upgrade with porcelain tile floors and a pretty half-bathroom with floating sink, while the original glass-front cabinets maintain the home's classic charm. The rear patio provides a nice area for planting and dining al fresco, with a breezeway to the street for bike and trash storage and easy guest access to warm-weather gatherings. There's a full basement with plenty of storage space and a washer and dryer!
Upstairs, the three bedrooms all have magical light, the front via a lovely south-facing bay window and the rear from its two exposures. The bathroom includes a stall shower with vintage marble surround and a separate soaking tub. There's plenty of extra storage and a full-size Samsung washer and dryer down in the basement. Added bonus: there's a fruiting fig tree on the property for all you fig lovers out there!
This home is in a convenient location near schools, SEPTA, Morris Rec Center, the Free Library and shopping centers. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate the easy access to Cobbs Creek Park with its biking and hiking trails, baseball, basketball and ice skating rink.
No smoking allowed. Tenant pays for utilities (gas, water, electric, internet). First and last month's rent and security deposit required for move-in. Applicants must submit last four pay stubs and have been at their current job for at least 6 months. Application includes background check, rental history check, credit check and a reference check.
Amenities
Backyard deck
Hardwood floors
Dishwasher
Fig tree
Front yard and back yard with space for gardening
Full basement for storage
Garbage Disposal in kitchen sink
Laundry

Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #204 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. Unit #204 is a lovely studio apartment on the second floor. You enter the unit into into a hallway with a closet for additional storage. The stunning kitchen features bar seating available at the counter, tile backsplash cabinetry above and below, an oven with electric cooktop, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator. title: Furnished 3bd/1ba house for rent
description:
Available mid-July: Welcome to 1023 Montrose St! This stunning 3 bedroom + Den / 1 bathroom single family home features hardwood floors & recessed lighting throughout, Central A/C, in-unit laundry, outdoor space, decorative fireplace, and more! Enter into a little tiled vestibule that leads to your common area with a straight-back floor plan. There is a large window at the front for natural sunlight and your kitchen is at the back. The spacious eat-in kitchen offers plenty of cabinetry, tile backsplash, a window over the sink, and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas range, built-in microwave, and fridge with water / ice dispenser. A large, concrete back patio is great for those warmer months, and there is a raised flower bed along one side for gardening. Head upstairs to view your first bedroom with a gorgeous faux brick fireplace. There is also a den on this floor for extra living space, and the full bathroom boasts tile flooring, subway tiling halfway up the walls, and a shower / tub combo. Continue to the third floor with 2 large bedrooms with closets and great natural sunlight. There is a washer / dryer in the unfinished basement for added connivence. Schedule your tour today! About The Neighborhood: Nestled in the gorgeous Bella Vista neighborhood of South Philadelphia, this incredible location has a Walkscore of 98, Bikescore of 87, and Transitscore of 79. You'll be walking distance to the Italian Market, East Passyunk Square, South Street, and Queen Village. There are ample shopping options along Washington Avenue and Broad Street. There are great parks nearby including the infamous Hawthorne Park, Ridgeway Park & Pool, Bardascino Park, Hawthorne Cultural Center, and Palumbo Recreation Center. title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Sauna
description:
The home at 2315 is a 575 square foot one bedroom one bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. The bathroom is also renovated. This home features neutral carpet to go with any decor well. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Most of the large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One of the windows in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a view of the park. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table from Metropolitan Bakery.

title: Superb 3BD Single Fam Home with Storage Space - Must See
description:
Available mid-June:
Welcome to 2637 Livingston St! This gorgeous 3 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom single family home offers 2,400 square feet of living space featuring fresh modern finishes, recessed lighting, iron stair rails, 2 walk-in closets, a giant roof deck, and more! Enter into the open floor plan common area with a large window at the front and the staircase straight ahead. There is ample room for separate living room and dining room set ups, and flow directly back into the kitchen. Your stunning kitchen is a chef’s dream! There are two rows of white cabinets above & below, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances. An island in the center offers counter seating, accent lighting, and additional prep space. There is a powder room for entertaining and lovely glass sliding doors that lead to your back patio, fully fenced in for privacy. A finished basement provides bonus living space and would work great as a den, office space, or workout room. Head upstairs on the second floor where you will find 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom boasting a lighted vanity with extra storage space, marble tile flooring, and a fully tiled bathtub with shower head. Your washer / dryer are also on this floor for added convenience. Continue to your elegant primary suite on the third floor. There is a wet bar in the hallway with 2 walk-in closets on either side, and a large bedroom to the front with great natural sunlight and a ceiling fan. The primary full bathroom is luxurious with dual vanities the full length of one wall, a separate soaking tub, and a standing shower stall with glass door. The roof deck extends the entire length of the house and offers striking views of Center City and the Benjamin Franklin Bridge. Call for a tour today!

The studio apartment home at 311 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Massive Bedroom in 2BD/2BA luxury apartment
description:
1bd/bath in 2bd/2bath in Graduate Hospital available for rental (July 2022 - May 2023). Can move in June if preferred.
Pets are welcome! I love animals, so if you have dogs and or cats, I am happy to help take care of them on occasion.
Layout:
Apt has vinyl floors throughout and lots of natural light. The bedroom that is available also has a private bathroom. The common space will be semi-furnished when you move in, and we can collectively determine how to furnish it.
The building has a rooftop with great views of the city, and a second floor patio for barbecues and hang outs -- see pictures! This is also a gated building complex, with security at night. There is a package room for your packages and mail boxes.
Parking space possibly available in the attached garage, and there is ample street parking.
Available Bedroom (unfurnished when you move in):
Very sizable space, photos are shown with furniture to give you an idea of the space. You can easily fit your own queen bed, desk etc. It has two-built in closets (see pictures). Lots of natural light from the one big window. The current occupant also has a dog and a cat who also have their beds / play equipment in the room.
Roommate:
I am a postdoc at UPenn so I'd prefer another professional to move in. I am pretty laid back and easy going, love hanging out with roommates but also very respectful and considerate of the other person's privacy. Guests are more than welcome to come over.
Utilities:
Rent is $1050, monthly utilities : ~ $25 for water, ~ $30 for power, and ~ $17 for wifi. Free laundry (washer/dryer) in the apartment.
Local amenities:
Apartment is by the edge of Graduate Hospital and South Philly, which gives you the opportunity to explore both areas, including some great Asian food in the neighbourhood. Many places and any amenities you might need are within 15 min walking distance including: 24hr CVS, Walgreens, Giant Heirloom, endless cafes, restaurants etc. The Italian market is 30 mins walking. This neighbourhood is also slowly getting gentrified and new opportunities will arise while you are here.
I personally bike to work (see my bike in the picture) and it takes me 12 mins to get to my office which is close to CHOP. It is a very pleasant ride, either with designated bike lanes, or single lane fares.
First, last, and security deposits are needed to hold the apt and you will need to provide proof of employment and sign a sublease before move in.
Showing now so email to schedule a time to see the place! Please tell me about yourself when responding. Thanks!

title: Contemporary Living!
description: Located in the booming neighborhood of Fairmount, this totally modern 3BD/3.5BA condo is a renter's dream! Eight years young, contemporary living space, 3 separate bedroom suites, a roof deck and more! The unit's first floor living space has an open-concept design featuring gorgeous bamboo flooring that continues throughout, sky-high ceilings with recessed lighting, large windows allowing sunlight to soak the main living space and a half bathroom. The sleek and stylish kitchen is equipped with trend-setting cabinetry, sea glass subway tile backsplash, GE stainless steel appliances and an incredibly spacious kitchen island perfect for prepping, serving, and dining! You will want to host friends and family regularly in this incredible living space. Not to mention, the 1st bedroom suite also occupies this floor. The first bedroom suite is complete with a spacious walk-in closet, recessed lighting, a private balcony with unobstructed skyline views and a private bathroom. The luxurious bath features porcelain tile flooring & walls, a spacious vanity and extra-large, glass stall shower! Venture upstairs to access the other 2-bedroom suites and grand laundry room complete with a brand-new, high end W&D (the LG washer is a smart appliance). The front suite features 3 large windows, dual closets and a porcelain tiled bath with a modern floating vanity and stall shower/tub combo! The grand, master suite is located in the rear, completely secluded from the other bedrooms. This space boasts high ceilings, an enormous walk-in closet with amazing storage space, and a resort-style bathroom. A his & her vanity, extra-large, glass walk-in shower and a separate soaking tub complete this note-worthy bathroom. Did we mention this home also includes a totally private, full roof deck with unobstructed, panoramic city views!
